## ThreadID.toString() method

toString returns the (multibase encoded) string representation of an ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toString(base?: Name): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  base | Name | Name of the base to use for encoding. Defaults to 'base32'. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
